article_metadata.author: Doug Schoen

og.description: As Congress continues to hem and haw over the budget, Republican leaders are pushing for deeper and deeper cuts to a multitude of programs. But while the cuts may satiate the conservative base, the White House has made it clear that a budget with such drastic reductions to crucial education [...]
